p: Immune system is a complex network of defence mechanism present in living organisms to fight the invading foreign microorganisms and provides protection from diseases. The immune system confers immunity to the organism by eliciting immune responses mediated by specialized immune cells and organs. Once the virus enters the host cells (cytopathic and non-cytopathic), it replicates, kills the infected cells, and invades other cells by releasing cellular contents ( MÃ¼nz et al., 2009).
